item.title: Change Websites Default Folder to Another Folder in Apache
item.description: Apache is the most used server.Â It is used to serve more than half of all active websites. It will be very helpful to understand Apache. Understanding the configuration of virtual host of Apache is important as sometime it will be a tough job to do. I will show you how to set default folder of a website other than root directory of Apache.
